page.title: 12CRICKET CLUB KILMARNOCK (2)
page.content: THE PAVILION CONSISTS OF {1}TWO DRESSING ROOMS WITH A SHOWER ROOM ADJACENT. {2}A LARGE LOUNGE OF APPROXAMATELY 100 SQ.METERS IN AREA INCORPORATING A BAR KITCHEN AND TOILETS. {3}AN AREA OF APPROXAMATELY 200 SQ. METERS WHICH IS FITTED WITH TWO CRICKET NETS FOR INDOOR PRACTICE PURPOSES. THIS AREA IS ALSO USED FOR A NUMBER OF OTHER SPORTS SUCH AS BADMINGTON,TABLE TENNIS,DARTS,INDOOR FOOTBALL AND OTHER GENERAL KEEP-FIT ACTIVITIES. ON THE SOCIAL SIDE THIS LARGE AREA IS USED FOR BARN DANCES AND DISCOS. THE CRICKET FIELD HAS A TOTAL AREA OF SOME 6 ACRES.WITH A PLAYING SQUARE IN EXCESS OF 1000 SQ. METRES.THE LARGE SQUARE IS ESSENTIAL TO ACCOMMODATE THE VAST NUMBER OF MATCHES THE CLUB PLAY EACH YEAR. CONTD.
